Save Link
you save your important link or important tab.

why Save Link
Extension "Save Link" is a simple yet useful tool that allows you to save and organize links of tabs and also you can save the link by giving input by user.
With this extension, you can easily save any important Tab Or important link, making it easy to find and access the item later.

To use the extension, simply navigate to the Website item you want to save and click the "SAVE TAB" button in your Chrome extension "Save Link" for Save current tab.  and add a custom link or description to help you remember why you saved it.
by clicking on "SAVE INPUT" button.
you can delete save link or tab by clicking "DELETE ALL" button.
you can change the theme to default by clicking "DEFAULT THEME" button. 

The extension provides a clean and user-friendly interface for managing your saved links, allowing you to easily view, edit, or delete them as needed. Additionally, you can search for specific saved items by title or description, making it easy to find what you need quickly.
